comment: **PLEASE READ - FOR IMAGES, PLEASE DROP THE IMAGE IN THE public/teamMembers
comment_: FOLDER AND USE '/teamMembers/[filename].[type]' AS THE IMAGE URL IN THE JSON FILE**
_comment: ALSO, LANDSCAPE IMAGES WILL BE BETTER***

teamMembers.name: Ethan C.
teamMembers.introduction: Ethan is a high school student who is passionate about astronomy and astrophysics. He is always looking for new ways to learn and explore the universe. Ethan is a dedicated student who is committed to making a positive impact on the world through his passion for astronomy.
